pitch.cc: Felix Doubront may prefer to go after Daniel Descalso, whose OPS is .656 this season, with the changeup rather than facing Matt Carpenter, whose OPS is .870.
Felix Doubront is having trouble locating his four-seam fastball, missing the strike zone with his last three.
Felix Doubront battled back from 3-0 to retire Daniel Descalso.
